title: New Zoe skin idea!
body:
Hear me out. Take Zoe, flip her color scheme by giving her a pink scarf and a gold key (instead of the blue scarf and silver key). And there you have Myisha!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
I’m assuming ur joking but...

Actually, I would love some chroma’s for a lotta base champions.   Rek’sai (we had a black version during development) Kled, Garen, Rakan, etc...
Garen already has base chromas, does he not?

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KRHPqJ7y,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-26T16:23:21.067+0000)
>
> I’m assuming ur joking but...
> 
> Actually, I would love some chroma’s for a lotta base champions.   Rek’sai (we had a black version during development) Kled, Garen, Rakan, etc...

I honestly don't get why Riot doesn't go wild with chromas, like I can't imagine they're that difficult to make or implement. Like take Eternum Rek'sai for example, change all the reds to blues and maybe tweak the base metal tone to better fit a cool color scheme and boom, you done. Maybe I completely misunderstand how this stuff works but is there a reason you couldn't do that in like 30 minutes?

Yeah :) I just love the mystery behind the two identities.

But I thought we already had chromas for base champs? Garen's Noble Chroma pack for instance. I think it'd be really cool for many others too, though the concept isnt new, no?

Base champion chromas are very attractive to free players I gotta say. Unfortunately it looks like they've primarily become skins-for-skins so free players first need to get lucky with chests before being able to use BE for chromas.
